      • addControllers

        public static void addControllers(RWMapFileController new_rwMapFileController,
                                  ReadController new_readController,
                                  WriteController new_writeController,
                                  GameController new_gameController,
                                  TournamentController new_tournamentController)
        This method is used to initialize all the controllers
        Parameters:
        new_rwMapFileController - is the .map IO controller
        new_readController - is map reader controller
        new_writeController - is the map write controller
        new_gameController - controlls the game start
        new_tournamentController - to start the tournament if in tournament mode
